sentences.en: an avuncular pat on the shoulder
He adopt an avuncular tone of voice when give advice to junior colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他用长辈的口气劝告年轻的同事.

sentences.en: He began to talk in his most gentle and avuncular manner.
sentences.cn: 他开始讲话了，态度极其和蔼而慈祥。

sentences.en: He was now playing the role of disinterested host and avuncular mentor.
sentences.cn: 他现在正扮演着慷慨的主人和伯父似的指导人的角色.

trans.tran_cn: <正>伯父的，像伯伯[叔叔]似的，谆谆长辈风范的，慈爱的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a kind and nice way to someone who is younger, rather like an uncle
